Items.text: Hi, this is the sign up for the dodgeball team!
Items.name: Jumper

Items.text: The school district decided it wasn't fair for kids with powers to play traditional sports.
Items.name: Jumper

Items.text: We will have tryouts late this week, so it's not guarenteed that you'll be on the team
Items.name: Jumper

Items.text: But we encourage eveyone to come and try their best!
Items.name: Jumper

Items.text: Sign up for the dodgeball team?
You have successfully signed up for dodgeball team.
